name: Home Return
description:
Help the Strays go home!!

Use mouse to click and drag. Fit the parts into their place. Fix the alien by clicking on the tape or threads and needles. But beware, one mistake and the alien will go berserk, then only God knows what could save you.

Credits:

Luxiere: Programming, Level Design

Raiso: Art, Level Design
https://raisohoho.artstation.com/

Deltapotato (Austin Blau): Sounds

Victorviet: Art
